So would you.

name: ssddr
text: You can get a pretty good idea of what madison looks like just from how wide and formless she appears.

name: jstegall
text: Man, I went to high school with a girl that scoliosis and became a stripper, and she used to like me... back before I posted this comment.

name: apocowarg
text: I am currently dating an ex-stripper who has scoliosis. The fact that two people who read Achewood know strippers with scoliosis isn't very odd. Scoliosis affects 2% of women and 0.5% of men in the general population. Now you know and knowing is half the battle!

name: semiquaver
text: Is your icon from that one Broken Social Scene video?

name: bixschmix
text: I am a woman and I have scoliosis, but I am not a stripper. Two out of three!

name: charchar
text: as am i.  so, that 4/6, which is still 2/3. Friggin' simplified fractions.

name: jstegall
text: Did you like me in high school though?

name: tekende
text: I have mild scoliosis, but am not a woman or a stripper. One out of three. I forget what the goal is here?

name: woodenteeth
text:
I have no scoliosis, I am a man and have never removed my clothes for the entertainment of others.

Seems like I lose whatever the goal is...

name: farqussus
text: You lose at losing.

name: woodenteeth
text:
I...

won?

text: Correct!

"oh my god she has got scoliosis"


With apologies to Jeff Koons.

name: i_love_kate
text:
Oh, right. They're dancing. I can't be the only person who saw that the other way.

Now only that, but if they actually were, Roast Beef's question would have twice the relevance.

name: cailetshadow
text:
Showbiz writes plausible things to say to people to get them to give him money on the backs of his hands.

It is sad because sometimes you are reading what he is saying to you off the back of his hand.

name: greatwhite
text: Her lack of punctuation seems like a good start.

name: ghede
text: Hey, Curvature of the spine is mad sexy. ... or so I tell myself.

name: phthoggos
text: Showbiz uses a special bank. It does not have ATMs on most streets.

name: thegrayhoodie
text:
YES! YES! A THOUSAND TIMES YES!
Why can't I give this strip a 10?

name: pzukowski
text: That scoliosis thing actually happpened to me.

name: inthewater
text: There could a book made entirely consisting of Roast Beef's freaky mental images. That would be an awesome book.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: *terrifying.

name: mikeronomicon
text: Beef reminds me of those dudes who wind up marrying the first girl they sleep with. Then move to a trailer park.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: so basically pre-Day-Off Cameron.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
one of my good church friends has slight scoliosis. it was from her that i learned of it.

i fancied her for a time but then she got married at eighteen to some gigantic jerk. i suppose it was her bit of teenage acting-out as i don't think she'd done much of that. i thought she had such a brighter future than just marrying young and living out of his parents' basement for the rest of her life in such a small town.

she is a great disappointment to me.

name: zapatos
text: at least she's great though.

name: zapatos
text:
oh my god...

I Have Scoliosis!

name: philophobe
text: Certainly one of my all-time favorite alt-texts.
